data_table.description: Subject ID, age, gender, study ID, year lived in USA, Hispanic/Latino background, education and occupation, household ID, family origin, marital status, height, weight, BMI, blood cell count, blood pressure, apnea/hypopnea, blood oxygen level, waist-to-Hip ration, asthma, diabetes, cancer, teeth, pregnancy, heart disease, chronic kidney disease, ECG, spirometry, physical activity, smoking, and treatment of participants involved in the "Hispanic Community Health Study /Study of Latinos (HCHS/SOL)" project.

variable.name: ASTHMA_MEDS
variable.description: Asthma Med Use - self/scanned (current asthma by MD diagnosis)

variable.name: CKD
variable.description: Chronic kidney disease using eGFR only (NIDDK)

variable.name: COPD_MEDS
variable.description: COPD Med Use - self/scanned (ever COPD by MD diagnosis)

variable.name: ECGA109
variable.description: Novacode 1.5; Atrial flutter or fibrillation, by visual flag (ECGA109)

variable.name: ECGA163
variable.description: Novacode 3: prolonged ventricular excitation; by software (ECGA163)
variable.value: Left bundle branch block (LBBB) w/o evidence of MI
Left bundle branch block (LBBB) with possible MI
Right bundle branch block (RBBB) w/o evidence of MI
Right bundle branch block (RBBB) with possible MI
Intermediate ventricular conduction delay (IVCD) w/o e
Borderline delay of right ventricular excitation
Borderline delay of left ventricular excitation

variable.name: ECGA264
variable.description: HRV - square root of the mean squared difference of successive NN intervals (ECGA264)

variable.name: ECGA265
variable.description: HRV - standard deviation of NN intervals (ECGA265)

variable.name: EDUCATION_C3
variable.value: Greater than high school or equivalent

variable.name: MED_FIBARES_NICOACID
variable.description: Fibric/nicotinic acids (trt of TG and HDL)

variable.name: MHEA16D
variable.description: Diabetes - insulin Trt for diabetes self (MHEA16D)

variable.name: MI_ECG
variable.description: Myocardial infarction defined by ECG results

variable.name: NTEETH
variable.description: No. teeth (primary, permanent, implant, root fragment)

variable.name: PRECHD_ANGINA
variable.description: Prevalent coronary heart disease, including self-report

variable.name: SLPA60
variable.description: Total time spent in apnea/hypopnea event (3% desat) (hours) (SLPA60)

variable.name: WEIGHT_FINAL_NORM_OVERALL
variable.description: Overall sample normalized Census 2010 calibrated trimmed nonresponse adjusted final weights - Year 1-3 (frozen as of 10/27/2011)

variable.name: FASTTIME
variable.description: Time fasting prior to blood draw

variable.name: INSULIN_OGTT
variable.description: Insulin, post OGTT (calibrated, converted to mU/L)

variable.name: US_BORN
variable.description: Born in mainland US (50 States + DC)

variable.name: REGION
variable.description: 6-Groups for Hispanic/Latino background, plus 1 "unknown" group for missing or other

variable.name: COPD_BY_BD
variable.description: COPD by BD test (for all valid PRE_BD)

variable.name: LISTNUM
variable.description: List address record assigned (1=Non-Hispanic surname list or 2=Hispanic surname list)

variable.name: HOMA_B
variable.description: HOMA index of beta cell function

variable.name: HBA1C_SI
variable.description: Glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) in SI units (mmol/mol), nearest integer

variable.name: WHIIRS
variable.description: Women's health initiative insomnia rating scale

variable.name: ELEVATED_BP_PLUSMEDS
variable.description: Elevated blood pressure or antihypert med use

variable.name: HIGH_TRIG_PLUSMEDS
variable.description: High triglycerides or fibares nicoacid med use

variable.name: LOW_HDL_PLUSMEDS
variable.description: Low HDL or fibares nicoacid med use

variable.name: ELEVATED_BP_SELFMEDS
variable.description: Elevated blood pressure or self-reported antihypert med use

variable.name: ECGA255
variable.description: MINN Code 8.1: Premature beats; by visual flag (ECGA255)
variable.value: Presence of frequent atrial or junctional premature beats (10% or more of recorded complexes).
Presence of frequent ventricular premature beats (10% or more of recorded complexes).
Presence of both atrial and/or junctional premature beats and ventricular premature beats (so that individual frequencies are < 10% but combined premature beats are >= 10% of complexes).

variable.name: ECGA267
variable.description: Major2; Major Q wave abnormalities [old Myocardial Infarction (MI)] (ECGA267)

variable.name: ABPA1A
variable.description: Right brachial systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1A)

variable.name: ABPA1B
variable.description: Right dorsalis pedis systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1B)

variable.name: ABPA1C
variable.description: Right posterior tibial systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1C)

variable.name: ABPA1D
variable.description: Left posterior tibial systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1D)

variable.name: ABPA1E
variable.description: Left dorsalis pedis systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1E)

variable.name: ABPA1F
variable.description: Left brachial systolic blood pressure (mm HG) (ABPA1F)

variable.name: ABPA3A3
variable.description: Occ Failure: Right posterior tibial systolic (ABPA3A3)

variable.name: ABPA3A4
variable.description: Occ Failure: Left posterior tibial systolic (ABPA3A4)

variable.name: ABPA3A5
variable.description: Occ Failure: Left dorsalis pedis systolic (ABPA3A5)

variable.name: OCEA15
variable.description: How often work late night shift (OCEA15)

variable.name: OHEA3C
variable.description: Pain in your face in past 12 months (OHEA3c)

variable.name: OHEA3D
variable.description: Pain in your jaw joint in past 12 months (OHEA3d)

variable.name: SLEA8
variable.value: No, not in the past 4 weeks
Yes, less than once a week
Yes, 5 or more times a week

variable.name: SLEA10
variable.value: No, not in the past 4 weeks
Yes, less than once a week
Yes, 5 or more times a week

variable.name: TBEA1
variable.description: Smoke at least 100 cigs in lifetime (TBEA1)

variable.name: TBEA5
variable.description: Some: number of days you smoked during past 30 days - original desc: some: past 30 days - smoke cigs (TBEA5)

variable.name: TBEA5A
variable.description: Some: cigarettes per day on days you smoked during past 30 days - original desc: some: past 30 days - quit smoking 6 months or longer (TBEA5A)

variable.name: TBEA9
variable.description: Average Cigs per day - entire time (TBEA9)

variable.name: WBEA11
variable.description: Spielberger scale - Feel nervous and restless (WBEA11)

variable.name: WBEA20
variable.description: Spielberger scale - state of tension or turmoil (WBEA20)

variable.name: MID_SLEEP_TIME_WKDAY
variable.description: WEEKDAY: Average of bed time and wakeup time, in hours (00-23.99)

variable.name: MID_SLEEP_TIME_WKEND
variable.description: WEEKEND: Average of bed time and wakeup time, in hours (00-23.99)

variable.name: THIAZIDE
variable.description: Thiazide diuretic: 1=Reported taking thiazide diuretic, 0=Not exposed

variable.name: TCA
variable.description: Tri & tetracyclic antidepressant: 1=Reported taking tri & tetracyclic antidepressant, 0=Not exposed

variable.name: ORAL_BB
variable.description: Oral/parental beta blockers: 1=Reported taking oral/parental beta blockers, 0=Not exposed

variable.name: PF_DMFS
variable.description: Number of decayed/missing/filled surfaces - Pit & Fissure surfaces only (max. 24)

variable.name: SM_DMFS
variable.description: Number of decayed/missing/filled surfaces - smooth surfaces only (max. 104)

variable.name: PF_DMFRS
variable.description: Number of decayed/missing/filled/root tip surfaces - Pit & Fissure surfaces only (max. 24)

variable.name: SM_DMFRS
variable.description: Number of decayed/missing/filled/root tip surfaces - smooth surfaces only (max. 104)

variable.name: SOL_WHI_STRESS_SUM
variable.description: SOL'S WHI STRESS VARIABLE: SUM OF 13 COMPONENTS
